News Story

FAC Felixstowe 2 Yeltz 5

13 September 1997

The road to Wem-ber-lee begins at local rivals Felixstowe with an emphatic 5-2 victory, with all the goals coming in the first half. We also hit the woodwork four times, but the moaners come away happy saying we should have scored ten.
